title: Prodapt Earns ISO 42001 Certification, the New Global Benchmark for Responsible Enterprise AI
description: CHENNAI, India — Prodapt today announced that it has been awarded the ISO 42001 certification, the world’s first and the only global standard for AI Management Systems (AIMS).
